title: Authors and Citation
text: Ben Raymond. Author, maintainer. Adrien Ickowicz. Author. Mark Lebedew. Contributor. Chau Le. Contributor. Michael Mattes. Contributor. Christophe Elek. Contributor. openvolley.org. Originator.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Raymond B, Ickowicz (2023). ovdata: Data Sets Use Openvolley Packages. https://ovdata.openvolley.org, https://github.com/openvolley/ovdata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ovdata: Data Sets For Use With Openvolley Packages},   author = {Ben Raymond and Adrien Ickowicz},   year = {2023},   note = {https://ovdata.openvolley.org, https://github.com/openvolley/ovdata}, }

title: Data Sets For Use With Openvolley Packages
text: ovdata package provides example data files data resources, primarily use openvolley package family. Data files contributed following people sourced following sites: Mark Lebedew Chau Le (Perana Sports) Michael Mattes Christophe Elek http://www.odbojka.si/
code: options(repos = c(openvolley = "https://openvolley.r-universe.dev",                   CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org")) install.packages("ovdata")  ## or  ## install.packages("remotes") ## if needed remotes::install_github("openvolley/ovdata")

title: ovdata — ovdata
text: Example data files data resources, primarily use openvolley package family.

what: Example volleyball match scout files — ovdata_example
title: Example volleyball match scout files — ovdata_example
Example volleyball match scout files — ovdata_example
Example volleyball match scout files — ovdata_example
text: choice string: one files return "190301_kats_beds" - full DataVolley file match GKS Katowice MKS Bedzin 2018/19 Polish Plus Liga (file courtesy Mark Lebedew) "190301_kats_beds-clip" - single rally "190301_kats_beds" DataVolley file. rally corresponds video clip contained ovdata_example_video("190301_kats_beds") "PM06" - (DataVolley) December 2012 men's Slovenian national championship semifinal ACH Volley Maribor (file http://www.odbojka.si/) "mlafin_braslovce_nkbm" - (DataVolley) January 2015 Slovenian junior women's final Braslovče Nova KBM Branik (file http://www.odbojka.si/) "clickscout" - example Click & Scout DataVolley file "2017_AVL_mens_HEAT_vs_UTSSU" - (Perana/VBStats) Men's Australian Volleyball League 2017: Canberra Heat vs UTSSU (file courtesy Chau Le) "2017_AVL_womens_HEAT_vs_UTSSU" - (Perana/VBStats) Women's Australian Volleyball League 2017: Canberra Heat vs UTSSU (file courtesy Chau Le) "stuttgart_schwerin_2018" - (DataVolley) 2018 women's final (first 3) German Bundesliga, Allianz MTV Stuttgart vs SSC Palmberg Schwerin (file courtesy Michael Mattes) "DCup7" - 2020 Austrian Women's Volley Cup played Hartberg UVC Graz (file https://www.volleynet./dvdownload/information/f-Damen/) "NCA-CUB" - Nicaragua vs Cuba women Pan American Cup, August 2022 (vsm format, courtesy Christophe Elek) string: either "path" (return path file) "parsed" (parse file R data structure using datavolley::dv_read() peranavolley::pv_read() simplify logical: default "parsed", returned list length choice entry parsed object. simplify TRUE asked single file (.e. length(choice) == 1, return just object (list containing object)

title: Example volleyball match scout files — ovdata_example
text: "path", character vector file path(s), otherwise list

title: Example volleyball match scout files — ovdata_example
code: myfile <- ovdata_example() x <- dv_read(myfile) summary(x) #> Match summary: #> Date: 2019-01-03 #> League: Plus Liga 2018/2019 - Plus Liga 2018/20189- Faza Zasadnicza #> Teams: GKS Katowice (Gruszka Piotr/Słaby Grzegorz) #>        vs #>        MKS Będzin (Siewiorek Emil) #> Result: 3-2 (25-20, 18-25, 25-15, 19-25, 15-6) #> Duration: 114 minutes  x <- ovdata_example("clickscout", as = "parsed") summary(x) #> Match summary: #> Date: 2020-02-04 #> League: League Div1 #> Teams: Team XYZ ( / ) #>        vs #>        Team ABC (Coach ABC/ ) #> Result: 3-1 (15-21, 21-19, 21-19, 23-21) #> Duration: 112 minutes

title: Example volleyball images — ovdata_example_image
text: choice string: one files return "190301_kats_beds" - image match GKS Katowice MKS Bedzin 2018/19 Polish Plus Liga

what: Example volleyball team roster files — ovdata_example_roster
title: Example volleyball team roster files — ovdata_example_roster
Example volleyball team roster files — ovdata_example_roster
code: ovdata_example_roster(   choice = "Stadium Mirandola",   as = "path",   simplify = TRUE )

title: Example volleyball team roster files — ovdata_example_roster
text: choice string: one files return "Stadium Mirandola" - team roster Stadium Mirandola (file http://volleynetworkitalia./) string: either "path" (return path file) "parsed" (parse file R data structure using datavolley::dv_read_sq() simplify logical: default "parsed", returned list length choice entry parsed object. simplify TRUE asked single file (.e. length(choice) == 1, return just object (list containing object)

title: Example volleyball team roster files — ovdata_example_roster
text: "path", character vector file path(s), otherwise list

title: Example volleyball team roster files — ovdata_example_roster
code: myfile <- ovdata_example_roster() ## read this file with ## x <- datavolley::dv_read_sq(myfile)  ## or have it read automatically x <- ovdata_example_roster(as = "parsed")

title: Example volleyball videos — ovdata_example_video
text: choice string: one files return "190301_kats_beds" - clip match GKS Katowice MKS Bedzin 2018/19 Polish Plus Liga

what: Objects exported from other packages — reexports
title: Objects exported from other packages — reexports
text: objects imported packages. Follow links see documentation. datavolley dv_read peranavolley pv_read
